p: The hydrodistillation of the samples of L. formosana oleoresin was performed with an all-glass Clevenger apparatus for 7 h. The water and resin were mixed in a ratio of 6:1 and the hydrodistillation was carried out with constant stirring of the mixture. The rate of hydrodistillation was around 2 mL/min. The isolated oil had a strong resinous aroma with floral, pine, and spicy notes. Oleoresin masses and essential oil yields are summarized in Table 1. The L. formosana oleoresin essential oils were stored in sealed amber vials at 4 Â°C until chromatographic analysis and bioactivity screening.
